Class ExtraDepot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board.ExtraDepot
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceSpot
public class ExtraDepot
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceSpot
The class represents the Extra Slot provided by the special ability of the ExtraDepot Leader Cards
